Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: David Chabot
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter and it is easy to use and has been capturing great picutres.  The fact that it is pink is also nice.  She loves the after picture features where she can write things with the stylus on top of the picture and funny effects.  This is a great camera for someone that needs it to be small and easy to use with impressive results...

Reviews.Title: Great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Sean M. Theoret
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend loves this camera!  I purchased it for her as a Christmas gift.  She took it on a trip to Vegas and got some great pictures.  Easy to use and fast!

Reviews.Title: Poor autofocus, poor performer
Reviews.Author: Bryan Dawson
Reviews.Content: I am a semi-professional photographer who bought this for his wife who was convinced she wanted it, especially for the panoramic function. Well, I gave in, beside my better judgment. Auto focus is simply not good, no matter how still you keep the camera. Too many poor shots. Works much better outdoors in bright sunlight. Slow performance as well. Nice to have the panoramic function, but poor-quality pictures overall make this a no-buy.

Reviews.Title: AMAZON POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
Reviews.Author: FABULOUS FEMALE "FF"
Reviews.Content: I cannot believe AMAZON sent me a USED camera. I am disappointed in the overall experience from ordering this camera to receiving it. There is no excuse that amazon can provide for providing such poor customer service. I will purchase my NEW camera from a SONY store.

Reviews.Title: Price change
Reviews.Author: Dez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item 2 weeks ago and now the price has dropped over $15. When I contacted amazon to see if I could get the difference I was told to ship it back and reorder it, which of course makes no sense what so ever. I have a return window of 2 months and I think it would only be far to refund me that difference instead of making me go through the hassle of having to return the thing and reorder it. The Camera works ok although its alittle difficult to use and the manual isn't very explanitory. But it's cute and does its purpose.
